name: The Visitor (itch) (TigerShark8980)
description:
This game was made for BGS Jam XVI - Theme: Reflection

They say right before you die, your entire life flashes before your eyes. When the car crash happens everything goes dark and there's just a voice. So is this the afterlife or is there something in your memories that is still worth living for?

The story of this game is take from some of the real life experiences of the people who made it.
